attributes.action: Make Moose Knuckle VIP the UK national anthem
attributes.additional_details: It will require some kind of officials to mandate it
attributes.background: God save the queen has become outdated, this is a tune that needs to be immortalised

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
